changes.description: Fix duplicate images appearing when searching with the cameo flag enabled.
Add a button to print out the cards currently displayed in search.
Reflect the search bar in the website url to make it easier to share.
Implement a share button that copies the current website url into your clipboard.
Fix issue with filters when the cameo flag was enabled.
Make sure sort button resets to default state upon a new search.
Fix badges not being animated upon a search.
Reorder entries in the filters box.
Fix release date ordering button.
Add stamps for 1st edition and reverse holo cards.
Fix cards with non numeric card numbers not showing up in the grid.
Fix cards not loading properly when there are too many on the screen.
Improve file loading performance.
Implement set searching.
Added a filter to show/hide energy cards.
Fix an issue with the filters box moving when there are no images in the grid.
Add a filter to show/hide trainer cards.
Add a filter to show/hide trainer owned pokemon.
Improve image loading performance.
Move some filters to a designated filters box.
Add a button to filter out 1st edition cards.
Fix sort button.
Add a helpful search tip.
Added a donation button.
Added a button to report a missing card.
Update buttons to be more mobile friendly.
Fix text clipping issue on mobile.
Set default grid size on mobile to 3 columns.
Change accent color.
Add animation to website title.
Added a changelog.
Added mobile support.
Title now changes on mobile.
Search bar is now sticky.
Added a scroll-to-top button.
Added a button to show/hide reverse holofoils.
Initial release of NottDex.
